item.dc:creator: Marc Stein
item.title: Stein: Big Donaghy questions ... and answers
item.description: Marc Stein looks at the issues facing the NBA in the Donaghy scandal.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: NFL commish orders Vick to stay away from camp
item.description: NFL commissioner Roger Goodell told Michael Vick to stay away from Falcons camp until the league reviews dogfighting charges against him.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Vinokourov tests positive for banned transfusion
item.description: Tour de France rider Alexandre Vinokourov tested positive for a banned blood transfusion after winning last weekend's time trial, prompting his Astana team to pull out of the race Tuesday.

item.dc:creator: Buster Olney
item.title: MLB execs: Rangers intent on trading star Teixeira
item.description: Executives with other teams believe that the Rangers are definitely intent on trading first baseman Mark Teixeira before the July 31 trade deadline.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Craig Biggio to retire after 20 seasons in baseball
item.description: Craig Biggio will retire after this season, MLB.com reported Tuesday.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Martin to make it official, retire from Jets, NFL
item.description: Jets running back Curtis Martin, the fourth leading rusher in NFL history who hasn't played since the 2005 season, will make it official this week and announce his retirement from the NFL.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Jury finds against Notre Dame's Weis in lawsuit
item.description: A jury found against Notre Dame football coach Charlie Weis in his malpractice lawsuit against two doctors he claimed botched his care after he had gastric bypass surgery five years ago.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: ACC says it performs background checks on refs
item.description: The Atlantic Coast Conference has performed background checks for the past year on game officials in three sports in an effort to prevent gambling scandals like the one faced by the NBA.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Sens make Emery one of NHL's best-paid goalies
item.description: Ray Emery and the Ottawa Senators avoided salary arbitration Tuesday by agreeing to a three-year deal worth $9.5 million moments before the two sides began their hearing.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: NTSB eyes cables in NASCAR fatal plane crash
item.description: Control cables were broken in the NASCAR plane that crashed into two suburban homes, killing five people earlier this month, federal investigators said Tuesday.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Devastated coaches, players fear for their safety
item.description: They've all been hit, anybody who coaches the bases, and Mike Coolbaugh's death after being struck in the head by a line drive as he stood in the first-base box was a sobering reminder of what a dangerous job it is.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Marlins to let legal system run its course on Olsen
item.description: The Marlins do not plan to immediately discipline left-hander Scott Olsen for his alleged scuffle with police and arrest on drunken-driving charges.

item.dc:creator: John Clayton
item.title: Meachem last of Saints picks to get under contract
item.description: To get his career off to a good start, Saints wide receiver Robert Meachem reached agreement on a five-year contract with New Orleans that allows him to report to training camp on time.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Danny Nutt gets good news from medical reports
item.description: Former Arkansas running backs coach Danny Nutt has received an encouraging report from doctors on the brain condition that led him to resign his position last week, Razorbacks head coach Houston Nutt said.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Polamalu is now best-paid Steeler in team history
item.description: The Steelers, the first NFL team to sign all of its rookies, opened training camp with a bang Monday by reaching a four-year contract extension with safety Troy Polamalu.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Texans' Green fulfills home dream for single mom
item.description: On Monday, Ahman Green made good on a promise to make the down payment on a home for a single parent in exchange for reclaiming his No. 30 from teammate Jason Simmons.
